entry.title: Lover Lover Shampoo Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Shampoo Bar
Price: 9.99 - 30.99 (4 variants)

Dirty Bee |  Shampoo Bar

Lover Lover : Passionate deep romantic smell

Our Shampoo bars are super concentrated and contain only luxurious, salon quality ingredients. Convenient, compact, and environmentally friendly, each bar will easily outlast three medium sized bottles of traditional shampoo! 

Benefits Include:

  • Luxurious Formula
  • Gluten Free
  • No Large Plastic Bottle 
  • Perfect for Traveling (FDA Compliant) & Camping 
  • Animal Cruelty Free
  • pH Balanced 
  • Vegan Friendly 
  • Long Lasting 
  • Mother Nature Approved 
  • Suitable For ALL Hair Types 
  • Ensures Beautiful, Soft, & Shiny Hair

Directions: Rub directly on hair or between hands and apply.  Wait 2-3 minutes before rinsing.  

Ingredients: Sodium Coco Sulfate, Water, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance/EO, Color (May contain: Charcoal Powder, Red#40 Lake, Brown Oxide, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Yellow #5 Lake, Yellow #6 Lake, Green #8, Green #5, Red #33, Violet #2)

entry.title: Dry Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Hair
Price: 16.99

Dirty Bee  |  Dry Shampoo

Never worry about dirty hair between shampoos! Dirty Bee Dry Shampoo is a true upgrade on those “not enough hours in the day” days. With a natural formula, including tea tree essential oil, Dirty Bee Dry Shampoo provides a gentle way to absorb those pesky oils, leaving behind no residue. Choose Dirty Bee Glow Up for lighter hair or Dirty Bee Break Up for darker hair to get the job done!

Dirty Bee |  Shampoo Bar

Puppy Paws : Invigorating minty scent

Protect your furry friend with the best flea and tick shampoo for dogs. Perfect for dogs with sensitive skin and is made with natural ingredients.

  • Easy to use, just suds up and rinse as normal
  • Store in a dry location between uses

  • Rich in Vitamin E and essential oils of eucalyptus, lavender, tea tree, and cedarwood
